pages.text: 夥伴鋼是一種非常有用的資源，您可以通過將青金石的魔力、夥伴卡片的力量和鐵結合，來創造這種合金，夥伴鋼會隨著您收集更多卡片而變得更加強大。它非常有用，因為一旦你完成你的卡片收藏，它會變得比獄髓更加強大！
In order to make buddysteel, you must first make buddysteel blend. This requires quite the hefty sum of lapis and iron, along with 3 buddycards or shredded buddycards.
To forge buddysteel, the buddysteel blend must be smelted for quite a long amount of time. If you are planning to make a lot of it, it is reccomended to have multiple blast furnaces.
